title: Meat and cabbage buns (Bierocks)
description: There are lots of different versions of these fab meat-filled buns. We made some and took them to a Zoigl – a kind of mini beer festival – where they went down really well.
ingredients: 1 x 7g/¼oz sachet of fast-action dried yeast
500g/1lb 2oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
1 tbsp sunflower oil, plus extra for greasing
